title: Quintessential Escape in One of Italy’s Best Boutique Hotels
description: Experience the unique charm of Italy, staying at Palazzo dei Mercanti - a boutique hotel in a historic Italian palace located in the city centre of Ascoli Piceno. Enjoy a daily buffet breakfast, four-course Italian dinner with wine, complimentary minibar, welcome drink each and access to the hotel’s spa facilities including a Turkish bath, chromo-therapeutic showers and more for two.
offer_address: Corso Trento e Trieste, 35 Ascoli Piceno
